subdisciplines.name: Seismology
subdisciplines.description: The study of earthquakes and seismic waves that move through and around the earth.

subdisciplines.name: Geomagnetism
subdisciplines.description: The study of the earth's magnetic field and its interactions with the earth's surface, atmosphere, and surrounding space.

subdisciplines.name: Geodynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the processes that shape the earth, including plate tectonics, mantle convection, and volcanic activity.

subdisciplines.name: Exploration Geophysics
subdisciplines.description: The use of geophysical methods to explore for natural resources and other subsurface features.

subdisciplines.name: Atmospheric Physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physics of the earth's atmosphere, including weather patterns, climate change, and atmospheric phenomena such as lightning and auroras.
